text: Brian Leigeb (born October 2, 1978) is a former professional American football defensive back. He played for the Indianapolis Colts in 2002. He is currently a college football assistant coach. ==Early life and college== Leigeb was born on October 2, 1978 in Midland, Michigan. He played high school football at Herbert Henry Dow and college football at Central Michigan. ==Professional career== In the 2002 NFL season, Leigeb played for the Indianapolis Colts. He appeared in 15 games, recording 11 total tackles, including two tackles for loss. ==Coaching career== Since 2011, Leigeb has served as the defensive backs coach for the football team at Northwood Timberwolves. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American football defensive backs Category:Central Michigan Chippewas football players Category:Indianapolis Colts players
title: Brian Leigeb
